name: Joel Miller
post_text: Leaving Austin and walking to Boston
post_image_text: FEDRA establishes quarantine zone in Boston . . .

name: Ellie Williams
post_text: Still traveling across the country we left KC a little but ago and looks like we finally might be getting to Wyoming soon

name: Joel Miller
post_text: Although You will never read this I wish you and Frank the best for where ever you may be now

retuit_info.name: Bill
retuit_info.post_text: To Joel: By the time you read this I assume you will have already reached my house I hope you found my letter and I wish you and Tess the Best

name: FEDRA
post_text: We are close to a Vaccine now

name: Bill
post_text: To Joel: By the time you read this I assume you will have already reached my house I hope you found my letter and I wish you and Tess the Best
